name: Sleepy Face
baseMeaning: A yellow face with closed eyes and a snot bubble coming from its nose, indicating sleep.
tldr: Tired, sleepy, or bored to sleep.

contextMeanings.meaning: Feeling very tired or about to fall asleep.
Can indicate something is so boring it puts you to sleep.
Used to show feigned tiredness from drama.

platformNotes.note: Used for tired tweets and boring content reactions.
Often accompanies 'POV: you stayed up too late' content.

generationalNotes.note: Used both literally and to indicate boredom.
Classic tired emoji for exhausting days.
